widget.description: Generates a tag cloud from categories and links.

setting.name: TITLE
setting.info: This title shows at top of the widget's generated content.

setting.name: LINKS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the site's links to be considered for the tag cloud, otherwise "No".

setting.name: CATEGORIES
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the site's categories to be considered for the tag cloud, otherwise "No".

setting.name: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF TAGS
setting.info: The maximum number of tags you want displayed.

widget.author: PhpLD
